Installation

Chai is available for both node.js and the browser using any test framework you like. There are also a number of other tools that include Chai.

Node.js

Package is available through npm:

npm install --save-dev chai

Browser

Include the chai browser build in your testing suite. You can either link to your own self-hosted version of chai or through a NPM CDN like jsDelivr or unpkg.

<script type="module">
  import { expect } from 'https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/chai@5.1.1/+esm';

  expect(1 + 1).to.equal(2);
</script>
